department.findDepartmentPage: SELECT tod.*, tod1.name AS parent_name, tou1.username AS create_name, tou2.username AS update_name FROM t_oauth_user tou1, t_oauth_user tou2, t_oauth_department tod LEFT JOIN t_oauth_department tod1 ON tod1.id = tod.parent_id WHERE tod.create_user = tou1.id AND tod.update_user = tou2.id
